summary: A horde of mutated birds descends upon the quiet town of Half Moon Bay, California. With the death toll rising, Two citizens manage to fight back, but will they survive Birdemic?
cast: Alan Bagh|Whitney Moore|Tippi Hedren|Janae Caster|Colton Osborne|Adam Sessa|Catherine Batcha|Patsy van Ettinger|Damien Carter|Rick Camp|Stephen Gustavson|Danny Webber|Mona Lisa Moon|Joe Teixeira|John Grant|Natalie Yonkers|Laura Cassidy|Bonnie Steiger|Eric Swartz|Zoya Skya|Cameron Palmer|Milan Lee|Jessica Osborne|Justin Osborne|Payton Osborne|Hailey Osborne|Chase Osborne|Kim Osborne|Martha Sisemore|Ken Agostino|Thomas Cokenias|Lindsey Moore|Kirsten Moore|Carlos Seletaria|Vanessa Quan|Abe Shawesh|Deborah Pacheo|Diane Urbano|Patrick Donahue|Steve McMoy|James Z. keywords: unintentionally funny|birds|coat hanger|nature run amok|bird attack
title: Birdemic: Shock and Terror
